name: Foxville
description:
Controls: 

  • MOVE  with WASD and Arrow keys.
  • ATTACK with SPACE
  • INTERACT with E and F

Coming from Unity and wanted to give Godot a chance. A very small demo with the most basic systems of a top-down 2d rpg implemented to learn the engine and its language. I really loved Godot and I'm probably sticking with it for my personal projects <3

Some of the art used is created by LimeZu (https://limezu.itch.io/serenevillagerevamped) and some from HeartBeast.
